vote.title: Consider removal of Redistricting Commissioner Kristin Scholer from office for any cause deemed by the city council sufficient for removal in the interest of the public, but only after a public hearing before the city council on charges publicly made, if demanded by such member within 10 days - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
